name: Ghost Chase!
description:
*This is a prototype demo. I plan to return to it in the future*

Take control of the Friar who is collecting corrupted relics in the Forbidden Forest. As you collect the relics, a Ghostly spirit is summoned to chase and eventually stop you! How long can you survive?

Features: 

-Old-school survivor horror elements!

-Sprite animations

-7 different relics to collect!

Controls:

Arrow keys - Directional movement

Space - Ghost repel (limited to ghost chase mode)

Special thanks to DVDFeverGames for making a gameplay video. Check out their channel here (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUdwu5ITRW6TYstAXUmv_DQ)
